title: 正版遊戲開啟問題
author: onzili
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bonzili 于 2014-3-14 19:42 编辑 

怎麼一開啟正版遊戲就彈出這個？如何解決？

** MagicMinecraftLauncher 1.2.5 ***
  LCP: ;C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\versions\1.7.5\1.7.5.jar;bin/jinput.jar;bin/lwjgl.jar;bin/lwjgl_util.jar
  MainClass: net.minecraft.client.Minecraft
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.minecraft.client.Minecraft
    at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
    at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
    at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
    at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
    at magic.launcher.Launcher.main(SourceFile:181)

replies.author: Forsworn_
replies.txt_content:
你弄作者可见谁看得见你说的啥啊(╯‵□′)╯︵┻━┻

另外既然你用的正版为何不用官方的启动器？？？

replies.author: fzh5837302
replies.txt_content: 正版请使用正版启动器
